messages.message:
Welcome to Revolution! A place where you can chat with your friends in public and private servers (private servers are still in development) and have fun! We are making our own API's and using a lot of new technology to empower our platform.

Amazing Contributors and Co-Owners


@MeowyCats2 (meowy2) (Co-owner) <--- I gladly applaud and value this member.
@JustAnEric (justxn3ric) (Owner)


Join our community on Discord!


Join us on Discord!

Hey gang! Looks like we have made a make server feature. This feature will currently be in beta, although it is working as expected.
We just need to work out a few bugs and then soon, you will be able to edit your servers!
Join our official Discord for updates: .gg/UPkkSDy4wa

Hello everyone, developer portal is now out.
[Click here](https://revolution-web.repl.co/developer) to try it out!
Markdown also is released, allowing you to *style* **your** `content`*!*
